|brand = Ubiquiti Networks |model = EdgeSwitch |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 8 150W |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 10/18/2020 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Ubiquiti_Networks_EdgeSwitch_8_150W |series = <!-- Device series --> |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification -->
|fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |pcb_id = <!-- Baord ID --> |ethoui = <!-- ethoui -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM53343; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 400 |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L25635FMI-10G; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = UniIC;SCB15H2G160-AF-13K; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|sw_cpu = true |sw2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|eth_ports = 8 |eth_speed = 1GbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = supported |sup_jumbo = yes |sw_class = managed
|exp_if_types = SFP |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIExpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = 2 |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 1.5 |pwr_poe_type = <!-- Type of POE --> |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = C13

|stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = Quad Integrated 802.3at Compliant PSE Controller;Broadcom;BCM59111;;2;,,, 80V PoE PD Controller;National Semiconductor;LM5071;;1;,,, 8-Channel I2C-Bus Switch;NXP;PCA9548A;;1;,,, Low Power Bidirectional I2C Isolator;TI;ISO1540;;1;,,, Quad Channel Digital Isolator;Silicon Laboratories;Si8441;;1;,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3221C;;1;,,, Dual 4-Channel Analog Multiplexer/Demultiplexer;NXP;74HC4052;;2;,,, 60V P-Channel MOSFET;ON Tech;NDS9407;;16;,,, 60V P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AOD409;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel Fast Switching MOSFET;Ubiq Semi;QM3014S;;2;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AO4566;;1;,,, 3A, 4.5-27V Simple Buck Regulator;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AOZ1212;;3;,,, 1MHz, 2.0A, Synchronous-Rectified Buck Converter;uPI Semi; uP9617;;1;,,, Wide Range Synchronous Buck Controller;National Semiconductor;LM5117;;1;,,, 8-bit Shift Register w/3 State Output;TI;SN74ACH595;;7;,,, Quadruple Bus Buffer Gate;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC125A;;2;,,, 2A Schottky Barrier Rectifier;Diodes Inc;B260/A;;2;,,, 3A Schottky Rectifier;Micro Commercial Components;SK310A;;7;,,, |flags = heatsink, PoE Switch, SFP, metal case, |accessible_UART =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |newegg = 9SIAJ5E8976315 |upc = 810354025679 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |asin = B01LHU98EK |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Vietnam
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== The Ubiquiti logo and "USW8WP" is silkscreened on the board. :All Ports support 802.3at PoE max 34.2 watts/port :54V DC input option
[[Category:English Documentation]]
